hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah that :the Prophet (saas) used to say: "Allahumma inni as'alukal-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afaf wal-ghina (O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity and affluence)

chapter.ara-name: باب دُعَاءِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication of The Messenger of Allah
